item.title: SpaceX "坚决拒绝 "美国联邦航空局对其违反发射要求的指控
item.description: SpaceX 周四表示，它 "强烈反对 "联邦航空管理局关于它未能遵守许可证要求以及在 2023 年两次发射前未获得变更批准的说法。【原文：SpaceX said Thursday it "forcefully rejects" the Federal Aviation Administration's contention it failed to follow license requirements and did not get approval for changes before two launches in 2023.】

item.title: 美国 8 月成屋销售下降，供应改善
item.description: 美国 8 月份成屋销售降幅超过预期，原因是尽管供应持续改善，但房价依然居高不下。【原文：U.S. existing home sales fell more than expected in August as house prices remained elevated despite a continued improvement in supply.】

item.title: 美国第二季度经常账户赤字因进口急剧扩大
item.description: 由于商品进口激增，美国第二季度经常账户赤字急剧扩大，达到两年多来的最高水平。【原文：The U.S. current account deficit widened sharply in the second quarter, reaching its highest level in more than two years amid a surge in imports of goods.】

item.title: 亚马逊为卖家增加聊天机器人，提高自动化水平
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）周四宣布了一项新的人工智能应用，称该应用将帮助其独立卖家进行销售指标、库存维护和产品广告等方面的工作。【原文：Amazon.com announced on Thursday a new artificial intelligence application that it says will help its independent sellers with sales metrics, inventory maintenance and product advertising, among other things.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会称，社交媒体用户无法控制人工智能使用的数据
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会在周四发布的一份报告中说，社交媒体公司收集、共享和处理大量用户信息，但却几乎不提供透明度或控制，包括人工智能系统如何使用这些信息。【原文：Social media companies collect, share and process vast troves of information about their users while offering little transparency or control, including over how it is used by systems incorporating artificial intelligence, the U.S. Federal Trade Commission said in a report released on Thursday.】

item.title: 美联储（终于）加入全球降息周期
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会加入了全球宽松周期，降息幅度超过预期的半个百分点。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve has joined a global easing cycle with a larger-than-anticipated half-point interest rate reduction.】

item.title: 交易员押注美联储下次降息幅度将更小
item.description: 周四，在经济数据显示失业保险申请人数意外下降后，交易员们加大了对美国联邦储备委员会下一次降息幅度将小于周三降息幅度的押注。【原文：Traders on Thursday added to bets the U.S. Federal Reserve's next rate cut will be smaller than the one it delivered on Wednesday, after economic data showed an unexpected drop in unemployment insurance claims.】

item.title: 穆迪称欧洲银行可能缺乏足够的贷款损失保障来应对房地产市场下滑
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）周四的一份报告称，如果严重的压力导致问题贷款快速增长，欧洲银行可能没有为房地产贷款违约做好充分准备，但判断贷款机构可能有足够强大的资本缓冲来应对。【原文：European banks may not be sufficiently provisioned for property loan defaults if severe pressure leads to rapid growth in problem loans, a report by Moody's Ratings said on Thursday, but judged lenders likely had strong enough capital buffers to cope.】

item.title: 食品公司味之素和达能为减少乳制品行业的二氧化碳排放建立合作关系
item.description: 食品公司味之素（Ajinomoto）和达能（Danone）周四宣布建立合作关系，以减少乳制品行业的温室气体排放。【原文：Food companies Ajinomoto and Danone unveiled on Thursday a partnership to reduce the dairy industry's greenhouse gas emissions.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数意外下降
item.description: 数据显示，9 月份就业增长有所加快。【原文：The data suggests job growth picked up in September.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称壳牌德国炼油厂股权出售面临延期
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的人士称，壳牌出售德国施韦德特炼油厂股份的计划因第三方未决诉讼而被推迟，使该公司等待多年的资产剥离计划停滞不前。【原文：Shell's planned sale of a stake in the Schwedt refinery in Germany is being delayed by pending lawsuits by third parties, two people familiar with the matter said, stalling a divestment the company has waited years for.】

item.title: 橄榄园业主达顿与优步合作提供外卖服务，股价大涨
item.description: 橄榄园的所有者达顿餐厅（Darden Restaurants）周四表示，它已与优步科技公司（Uber Technologies）达成了一项外卖协议，使其股价在盘前交易中上涨了约 7%。【原文：Olive Garden-owner Darden Restaurants said on Thursday it has entered into a delivery deal with Uber Technologies , sending its shares up about 7% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 美联储大幅降息后，在美国上市的加密货币股票大涨
item.description: 周四开盘前，在美国上市的加密货币股价跳涨，此前降息半个百分点引发了市场对风险资产的追捧，为这个今年已取得一些重大胜利的行业增添了动力。【原文：U.S.-listed crypto shares jumped before the open on Thursday after a half-percentage point interest rate cut sparked a flight into risky assets, adding to the momentum of an industry that has already secured some big wins this year.】

item.title: 美联储降息后需求有望提振，美国住宅建筑商股大涨
item.description: 受美联储宣布超幅度降息后借贷成本降低导致需求增加的预期提振，美国主要住宅建筑商的股票在周四的盘前交易中大涨。【原文：Shares of major U.S. homebuilders surged in premarket trade on Thursday, buoyed by expectations of higher demand due to reduced borrowing costs after the Federal Reserve unveiled an oversized interest rate cut.】

item.title: 加拿大央行：协商一致的决定并不意味着所有成员都同意利率路径
item.description: 作者：Promit Mukherjee 和 David Ljunggren【原文：By Promit Mukherjee and David Ljunggren】

item.title: 万事达卡预测：美国假日销售额将再次增长 3%，促销活动将成为焦点
item.description: 万事达卡公司（Mastercard）周四的预测显示，由于今年的购物窗口期比往年短，企业希望通过优惠来吸引节俭的购物者，因此美国假日季的零售销售额预计将增长 3.2%。【原文：U.S. retail sales are expected to rise 3.2% in the holiday season as companies look to deals to attract thrifty shoppers during a shorter-than-usual shopping window this year, a Mastercard forecast showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国运输部长称对波音公司劳资解决方案持乐观态度
item.description: 美国交通部长皮特-巴蒂吉格（Pete Buttigieg）周四表示，他相信双方都希望就波音公司的劳资纠纷达成协议，在这场纠纷中，3万名罢工的机械师已经停止了波音公司最畅销的737 MAX和其他飞机的生产。【原文：U.S. Transportation Secretary Pete Buttigieg on Thursday said he believes both sides want to reach an agreement in the labor dispute at Boeing in which 30,000 striking machinists have halted production of its best-selling 737 MAX and other airplanes.】

item.title: 美国 FDA 拒绝批准旺达的胃麻痹药物
item.description: 美国食品和药物管理局拒绝批准万达制药公司治疗胃麻痹症状的药物，该公司周四表示。【原文：The U.S. Food and Drug Administration has declined to approve Vanda Pharmaceuticals' drug to treat stomach paralysis symptoms, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 英国央行维持利率不变，延长减债计划
item.description: 英国央行周四将利率维持在 5.0%，并投票决定在未来 12 个月内将英国政府债券存量再减少 1000 亿英镑（约合 1,330 亿美元），此举可能会对政府财政造成压力。【原文：The Bank of England held interest rates at 5.0% on Thursday and voted to run down its stock of British government bonds by another 100 billion pounds ($133 billion) over the coming 12 months, a move that could weigh on the government's finances.】

item.title: 解说员：欧洲央行在联合信贷银行和德国商业银行的任何合并中的作用
item.description: 消息人士告诉路透社，意大利第二大银行意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）已持有德国商业银行（Commerzbank）9% 的股份，并正在寻求批准将持股比例提高到 29.9%。【原文：UniCredit, Italy's second-largest bank, has taken a 9% stake in Germany's Commerzbank and is seeking permission to potentially raise this to 29.9%, sources told Reuters, while saying it would be open to a full takeover bid.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行的 Orcel 瞄准欧洲银行业边界，与德国商业银行打赌
item.description: 数十年来，Andrea Orcel 一直是首席执行官们在重塑银行业格局的大型交易中寻求建议的 "造雨者"。【原文：For decades, Andrea Orcel was the 'rainmaker' who CEOs turned to for advice on the big deals that reshaped the banking landscape.】

item.title: 报告称，上游电气化可将油气生产排放减少 80% 以上
item.description: 研究公司 Rystad Energy 周四发布报告称，石油和天然气生产设施通过改用可再生能源或指定用于燃烧的天然气发电，可减少 80% 以上的相关排放。【原文：Oil and gas production facilities could reduce associated emissions by more than 80% by switching to electricity generated from renewables or natural gas designated for burning, a report from research firm Rystad Energy said on Thursday.】

item.title: 德国媒体帝国阿克塞尔-施普林格与 KKR 达成分拆协议
item.description: 德国媒体帝国阿克塞尔-施普林格公司（Axel Springer）周四表示，根据首席执行官马蒂亚斯-多普夫纳（Mathias Doepfner）与私募股权公司 KKR 达成的协议，该公司将一分为二，以确保这位亿万富翁首席执行官对新闻刊物《图片报》（Bild）和《政治家》（Politico）的控制权。【原文：German media empire Axel Springer will be split in two under a deal between CEO Mathias Doepfner and private equity firm KKR , the company said on Thursday, securing the billionaire chief executive's control over news titles Bild and Politico.】

item.title: 英特尔表示暂无剥离 Mobileye 多数股权的计划
item.description: 陷入困境的芯片制造商英特尔（Intel）周四表示，它没有剥离 Mobileye 多数股权的计划，这使得这家自动驾驶技术公司的股价在盘前交易中上涨了 8%。【原文：Struggling chipmaker Intel said on Thursday it had no plans to divest a majority stake in Mobileye , sparking an 8% rise in the self-driving tech firm's shares in premarket trading.】

item.title: 英格兰银行将利率维持在 5%，延长 1,000 亿英镑债券削减计划
item.description: 英国央行上个月自 2020 年以来首次下调了借贷成本。【原文：The BoE last month delivered its first reduction to borrowing costs since 2020.】

item.title: 塔吉特任命吉姆-李为首席财务官
item.description: 美国零售商塔吉特（Target）周四任命吉姆-李（Jim Lee）为首席财务官，并于 9 月 22 日生效。【原文：U.S. retailer Target on Thursday named Jim Lee as its chief financial officer effective Sept. 22.】

item.title: 巨额降息缓解违约风险和成本担忧，美国银行股上涨
item.description: 在美联储将利率下调 50 个基点一天后，美国银行股在周四的盘前交易中上涨，预计这将降低存款成本，减轻借款人的压力。【原文：U.S. bank stocks rose in premarket trading on Thursday, a day after the Federal Reserve cut interest rates by 50 basis points, which is expected to reduce deposit costs and alleviate pressure on borrowers.】

item.title: 如何退休：晨星专家解决五个可怕的问题
item.description: 如果你觉得为退休做计划很难，那么告诉你一个小秘密：对每个人来说都很难，即使是世界上最权威的退休专家也不例外。【原文：If you find it hard to plan for retirement, here is a little secret: It is hard for everyone – even the world’s foremost experts on the topic.】

item.title: 早间竞价：美联储快速 "调整 "股市，英国央行紧随其后
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 聚焦：UnitedHealth 技术部门的竞争对手称，黑客攻击后的新客户会留下来
item.description: UnitedHealth 技术部门 Change Healthcare 的小型竞争对手表示，他们正在与医院和其他客户签订更长期的合同，这些医院和客户在 2 月份的网络攻击导致 Change Healthcare 服务关闭后暂时放弃了该公司的服务。【原文：Smaller rivals to UnitedHealth's tech unit Change Healthcare say they are signing longer-term contracts with hospitals and other customers who had temporarily switched from the company after February's cyberattack shut down the unit's services.】
